titles.title: To provide for reliquidation pursuant to section 1003 of the Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 1999.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate specified entries of 13-inch televisions and pay amounts owed.
